description: Create valuable content that attracts and engages your target audience. Includes blog posts, videos, podcasts, and social media content. Helps establish thought leadership and build trust with potential customers.
Develop a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with business goals. Includes platform selection, content calendar, engagement tactics, and community management.
Learn how to optimize your website and content for search engines. Covers keyword research, on-page optimization, technical SEO, and link building strategies.
Build targeted email campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers. Includes list building, segmentation, copywriting, and analytics.
Master paid advertising across Google Ads, Facebook/Instagram, LinkedIn, and other platforms. Includes campaign setup, optimization, and ROI tracking.
tools: Google Ads|Facebook Ads Manager|LinkedIn Campaign Manager

description: Implement tracking systems to measure marketing performance. Understand key metrics like CAC, ROAS, conversion rate, and attribution modeling.
